scripts.clean: npm run clean --prefix functions && npm run clean --prefix web
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix functions && npm install --prefix web
scripts.build:local: npm run build --prefix functions && npm run build:local --prefix web
scripts.build:dev: npm run build --prefix functions && npm run build:dev --prefix web
scripts.build:prod: npm run build --prefix functions && npm run build:prod --prefix web
scripts.watch:local: npm run watch --prefix functions & npm run watch:local --prefix web
scripts.start:local: firebase emulators:exec 'npm run watch:local' --project demo-project --ui --config firebase.local.json --import data/dev
scripts.deploy:dev: npm install && npm run build:dev && npm run login && firebase deploy --project
scripts.deploy:prod: npm install && npm run build:prod && npm run login && firebase deploy --project
